title: Realistic Biomes
description:
Experience a complete overhaul of the Minecraft landscape with Realistic Biomes. This resource pack focuses on environmental immersion by adding high-fidelity textures and natural color palettes to every biome in the game.

From the dense, foggy atmosphere of revamped swamps to the crystal-clear waters and vibrant coral of the tropical oceans, every environment feels more grounded and alive. Optimized for performance while maintaining a high level of detail, this pack is perfect for players who want a more cinematic and realistic survival experience without changing the core mechanics of the game.
author: Oreville Studios
